Title: Slider in the banner under the graph when combined
Precondition: Open the site on the main page, Scroll to the Trading calculator
STR: 1. Set the left slider in an arbitrary place, except for the leftmost position 2. Move the right slider to it 3. Pull the left slider
Expected: The left slider moves to the left
Actual: When combining sliders in one place, the last slider dominates. Unable to expand sliders when interacting with a previous slider
